subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: In his first Grand Tour since returning from retirement, Lance Armstrong said he would ride to support his American teammate Levi Leipheimer on the Astana team.
snippet: In his first Grand Tour since returning from retirement, Lance Armstrong said he would ride to support his American teammate Levi Leipheimer on the Astana team.
